Effective Date: 30/08/2025
Operated by Oorwin Labs Inc (“us”, “we”, or “our”)

1. Overview

Please read these Terms and Conditions (“Terms”) carefully before using the www.oorwin.ai website and the Oorwin mobile application (together or individually, the “Service”).

By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, you may not use the Service.

2. Communications

By creating an account, you agree to receive newsletters, marketing messages, and updates. You may opt out at any time using the unsubscribe link in our emails or by contacting info@oorwin.ai.

3. Purchases

If you purchase a product or service, you may be required to provide payment and billing details (e.g., credit card information, billing address).

You represent that:

  • You are authorized to use the payment method provided.
  • All information you provide is accurate and complete.

We may use third-party providers to process payments. Submitting your details gives us the right to share them securely with such providers in line with our Privacy Policy.

We reserve the right to refuse or cancel purchases if fraud or unauthorized transactions are suspected.

4. Availability, Errors, and Inaccuracies

Our Service may occasionally contain errors, inaccuracies, or outdated information. We reserve the right to update or correct such errors without prior notice.

5. Subscriptions

Some services are billed on a subscription basis (“Subscriptions”), with billing cycles set monthly or annually.

  • Subscriptions renew automatically unless cancelled.
  • You must provide valid and complete billing information.
  • If automatic billing fails, you will receive an invoice to complete payment manually.

6. Free Trials

We may offer free trials at our discretion. If billing information is required, charges will not apply until the trial ends. Unless cancelled before expiration, the subscription will auto-renew at standard rates.

7. Fee Changes

We may change subscription fees with prior notice. Continued use after the change constitutes acceptance of the new fee.

8. Refunds

Refund requests will be reviewed case by case and granted at our discretion.

9. Content

You are responsible for all content you upload, post, or share. By posting, you grant us a license to use, modify, and display such content on the Service.

We reserve the right to remove or restrict any content that violates these Terms or applicable laws.

All other content on the Service is the property of Oorwin Labs Inc and may not be reused without permission.

10. Accounts

When creating an account, you agree to:

  • Be at least 18 years old.
  • Provide accurate and complete information.
  • Keep your login credentials secure.

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts for violations, fraudulent activity, or misuse.

11. Copyright Policy

We respect intellectual property rights. If you believe your copyright has been infringed, you may contact us at info@oorwin.ai with the subject line “Copyright Infringement” and include detailed proof of your claim.

12. DMCA Notice

DMCA claims must include:

  • Your signature (electronic or physical)
  • Identification of the copyrighted work and infringing material
  • Contact information
  • A good faith statement that the use is unauthorized
  • A declaration under penalty of perjury that your claim is accurate

Submit claims to our Copyright Agent: info@oorwin.ai

13. Intellectual Property

The Service, including its design, features, and content, remains the exclusive property of Oorwin Labs Inc and its licensors. Unauthorized use of trademarks, content, or brand materials is prohibited.

14. Links to Third-Party Sites

Our Service may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their content, policies, or practices. You access them at your own risk.

15. Termination

We may terminate or suspend your account immediately for violating these Terms.

Provisions that by nature should survive termination (ownership, disclaimers, indemnity, limitation of liability) will continue to apply.

16. Indemnification

You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Oorwin Labs Inc, its affiliates, and employees from any claims, damages, or liabilities arising from your use of the Service or violation of these Terms.

17. Limitation of Liability

Oorwin Labs Inc shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages, including but not limited to loss of data, profits, or goodwill, even if advised of the possibility of such damages.

18. Disclaimer

The Service is provided “AS IS” and “AS AVAILABLE” without warranties of any kind, express or implied. We do not guarantee uninterrupted access, error correction, or that the Service will meet your requirements.

19. Exclusions

Some jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion of warranties or limitation of liability. In such cases, these limitations may not apply to you.

20. Governing Law

These Terms are governed by the laws of Delaware, United States, without regard to conflict of law principles.

21. Changes

We may update these Terms at any time. Material changes will be communicated at least 30 days before taking effect. Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

22. Contact Us

For any questions about these Terms, please contact us:

Oorwin Labs Inc
508 Silicon Dr.
Southlake, TX 76092
United States

Email: info@oorwin.ai
Website: www.oorwin.ai
